description:
Saving lost souls on the tightest budget known to man is only a day`s work for half-human, half-Shinigami kind-of-thing http://anidb.net/ch72753 [Rinne]! Together with the almost too-collected http://anidb.net/ch72755 [Sakura] and his black cat http://anidb.net/ch72752 [Rokumon], life continues as normal as Rinne helps guide the dead to their final rest. However, new transfers are never a good sign, and a popular http://anidb.net/ch87714 [fortune teller] ends up at Rinne and Sakura`s school as their new teacher. Things get chaotic when a strange http://anidb.net/ch87713 [girl] wielding a scythe makes an appearance, and Rinne realizes that he might discover a major piece surrounding the mystery of his past.
Source: sentai filmworks

REGULAR.description:
When Sabato gets caught distributing fake Shinigami Gold licenses, Rinne discovers that his father might have been a genius Shinigami in high school!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gold License
Gold License
Le permis or
ゴールドライセンス

REGULAR.description:
A ghost hand seems to have a grudge against a member of the track team. Later, Sakura discovers a mysterious female spirit who demands art students to draw her face.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le champion maudit – Dessine-moi
Norowareta Ace / Watashi o Egaite
The Cursed Ace / Draw Me
呪われたエース / 私を描いて

REGULAR.description:
Rinne and the other Shinigami are tasked with cleaning the Wheel of Reincarnation. The dangerous work only gets worse when a brawl breaks out, and Damashigami enter the scene.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le nettoyage de la roue de la réincarnation – Une rancœur sans limites – Un chiot sous la pluie
Rinne no Wa: Issei Seisou / Urami Mugendai / Ame no Naka no Koinu
Wheel of Reincarnation Cleanup Day / Infinite Malice / A Puppy in the Rain
輪廻の輪 一斉清掃 / 恨み無限大 / 雨の中の子犬

REGULAR.description:
Sakura meets a fortune teller who illegally possesses a Shinigami tool. Rinne goes to collect it, but the fortune teller won`t give up her crystal ball without a fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ane at the Shopping Mall
Annette du centre commercial
Shopping Mall no Ane
ショッピングモールの姉

REGULAR.description:
Tamako asks Rinne to train a young black cat to support a Shinigami, but this cat`s particular phobia gets in the way. Later, Rinne hopes to intercept a "lucky" pot of money!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuroboshi Sansei / Kaiun no Tsubo / Niji-iro no Takenoko
Kuroboshi Sansei / The Lucky Pot / Bamboo Shoot in Rainbow Color
Sanse Kuroboshi – Le pot de chance – La pousse de bambou arc-en-ciel
黒星三世 / 開運の壺 / 虹色のタケノコ

REGULAR.description:
Shoma offers to pay Rinne handsomely to take care of a sacred bird, forgetting to mention the bird`s frightening appetite. Later, Sakura meets the ghost of an angry bride.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`esprit-oiseau protégé – Mariée de juin – Le coffre des enfers
Special Protected Sacred Bird / June Bride / The Safe from Hell
Tokubetsu Hogo Reichou / June Bride / Jigoku no Kinko
特別保護霊鳥 / ジューンブライド / 地獄の金庫

REGULAR.description:
Jumonji finally gets a chance to impress Sakura when he tries to quell a mischievous spirit. Later, Sakura and Rinne help a "creepy" spirit give the performance of his life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La pierre de pouvoir errante – Poltergeist – Les tabous des Shinigami
Samayoeru Power Stone / Poltergeist / Shinigami Sakai no Taboo
Wandering Power Stone / Poltergeist / The Taboo in the Shinigami World
さまよえるパワーストーン / ポルターガイスト / 死神界のタブー

REGULAR.description:
A cursed doll from Ageha`s past comes to haunt Renge. Later, Rinne helps a spirit by setting her up on a date with Matsugo, despite Matsugo`s lingering affections for Rinne!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanoka Dattara Akeru Koto / Gin`iro no Kama / Shinigami Ouji
Open After Seven Days / Silver Scythe / Prince of the Shinigami
À ouvrir dans sept jours – La faux argentée – Le prince Shinigami
七日たったら開けること / 銀色のカマ / 死神王子

REGULAR.description:
Sabato falls victim to the mackerel curse! Later, Jumonji invites Sakura to study for a test at his place, only to have his alone time with her horribly interrupted.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Apologize in the Altar Room / Goddess of Wisdom / River of Treasure
Butsuma de Ayamare / Chie no Megami / Takara no Kawa
Excuse-toi à l`autel – La déesse de la sagesse – La rivière au trésor
仏間で謝れ / 知恵の女神 / 宝の川

REGULAR.description:
Someone is trying to take over the Damashigami Company! Later, when Renge tries to steal Annette`s Peep Ball, she sees a vision of Kain... putting handcuffs on her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Ikkai Kumiai Taikai / Imarishiki Yogen
La première assemblée syndicale – L`abominable prédiction
The First Union Meeting / An Ominous Prophecy
第一回組合大会 / いまわしき予言

REGULAR.description:
A search for Kain goes awry as Ageha and Matsugo continue to fight for Rinne`s affection. Later, Sakura notices that Rinne, who never studies, is passing every test. How?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hanabatake no Nazo / Migiude Kashimasu / Kuroi Tsuuchihyou
Le mystère du champ de fleurs – Je te prête ma main droite – Le noir bulletin scolaire
Mystery of the Flower Field / I Will Lend You My Right Arm / Black Report Card
花畑の謎 / 右腕貸します / 黒い通知表

REGULAR.description:
Rinne tries to purify a poltergeist, and Sakura helps a spirit who`s scared of eggplants. Later, the group takes a trip to a festival to bust a Damashigami scheme.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bessou no Akuryou / Nasu Roman / One Coin Chousa
Evil Spirit in the Summer House / Eggplant Romance / One Coin Investigation
Le spectre de la villa – Romance d`aubergine – Une pièce pour une enquête
別荘の悪霊 / ナスロマン / ワンコイン調査

REGULAR.description:
While visiting a pawn shop Rinne discovers something related to his mother, and learns more about her. Later, Sakura and Rinne check on a little girl who can see spirits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Otome la Shinigami
Otome the Shinigami
Shinigami Otome
死神 乙女

REGULAR.description:
Sabato reveals an interesting detail concerning the disappearance of Rinne`s mother, leading the others to a startling revelation about little Ichigo`s true identity.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lies and Truth
Mensonge et vérité
Uso to Shinjitsu
ウソと真実

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo asks Rinne to banish "Kokkuri-san". Sabato tries to offload a cursed piggy bank. Later, Sansei makes another attempt to fight his fear of spirits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kokkuri-san / Cursed Piggy Bank / The Hated Sansei
Kokkuri-san / Kashiri Kanebako / Kirawareta Sansei
Kokkuri-san – La tirelire maudite – Sanse le mal-aimé
こっくりさん / 呪金箱 / 嫌われた三世

REGULAR.description:
Stingy Annette finds herself suddenly unable to save money. Is it truly a snake spirit`s curse? Later, Masato attempts to sabotage Rinne`s happiness... again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Curse of Splurge / The Cursed Peep Ball
L`envoûtement panier percé – La boule de vision maudite
Sanzai no Noroi / Norowareta Nozoki Tama
散財の呪い / 呪われたのぞき玉

REGULAR.description:
Refuto hires Rinne to protect an offering of delicious dumplings. Later, Rinne looks forward to a Saury Festival... with one hidden condition.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Head Man / When You Wish Upon the Moon / The First Saury Festival
Kubi Otoko / Tsuki ni Negai o / Daiikkai Sanma Matsuri
L`homme-tête – Un souhait à la lune – Le premier festival du balaou
首男 / 月に願いを / 第一回サンマ祭り

REGULAR.description:
Rinne`s dreams are being invaded by a Dream Demon. To stop the madness, Rinne and Matsugo have to capture a it in a world where one person`s dream is another`s nightmare!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La capture du démon onirique
Muma Hobaku Jisshuu
The Practical Training for Capturing a Dream Demon
夢魔捕縛実習

REGULAR.description:
Incidents around steamed buns make life difficult for Rinne and Rokumon. Later, Rinne experiences a problem originating from a mysterious package of mushrooms.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nakami ga Nai / Koshikudake Saka no Kai / Matsutake no Hamon
Nothing Inside / Mystery of Koshikudake Hill / Effect of the Matsutake Mushroom
Rien à l`intérieur / Le mystère de la côte insurmontable / Les rides du matsutake
中身がない / 腰砕け坂の怪 / 松茸の波紋

REGULAR.description:
Something terrible has happened to Matsugo: he`s turned into an angel! Worse, he`s HELPING people! Later, Sakura and Ichigo bump into Shoma as he tries to help a hippo spirit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les ailes du bonheur / Hippo-kichi / La plainte de la cassette
Shukufuku no Hane / Kabakichi-kun / Cassette Tape no Himei
Wings of Celebration / Kabakichi-kun / Scream of a Cassette Tape
祝福の羽 / カバ吉くん / カセットテープの悲鳴

REGULAR.description:
Rinne is suspected of stealing money at his own school! On the hunt to find the actual perpetrator, he discovers how little faith his friends have in him and his poverty.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Black Square Thing / Shortcut Through the Alley
Le rectangle noir / Le raccourci par la ruelle
Shikakukute Kuroi Yatsu / Roji no Chikamichi
四角くて黒いやつ / 路地の近道

REGULAR.description:
Ageha has one last chance to stop her sister from making the biggest mistake of her life: marrying Sabato! Later, Rinne discovers that Rokumon may have a secret food supply.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Ring and Stamp / Food at the Porch / Black Cat Children`s Association
La bague et le sceau / De la nourriture sous la véranda / La fête des chatons noirs

REGULAR.description:
The new wax finish on Rinne`s scythe is attracting coins! Later, Sakura helps her friends Miho and Rika when a walking mannequin attacks them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good Luck Wax / Maneko and Kotomi / Where`s My Money?!
Kin`un Wax / Maneko to Kotomi / Furikomi wa Mada ka!
La Cire de la fortune — Maneko et Mantomi — Où est mon remboursement ?
金運ワックス / マネ子とコト美 / 振り込みはまだか!

REGULAR.description:
Sakura finds herself dealing with a fierce dog spirit... but is he really a dog? Later, Rinne wonders if his never ending money problems can be solved by a money spirit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Capture de chien méchant / L`esprit doré / L`héritage
Mouken Hokaku Hoshuu / Kanadama / Akuryou Isan

REGULAR.description:
Matsugo invites Rinne to his school festival, so (of course) Sakura, Jumonji, and Renge come along. The festival`s ghost-house proves more dangerous than they thought.
Source: crunchyroll
